0.text: This year, I'm thankful that there's

2.text: lots of people out there that will pay you to grow a mustache.

5.text: The job market may not be so hot,

7.text: but I'll be doing all right.

9.text: OK, I'm thankful for Gilbert Two, so we can meet

18.text: I'm thankful for my friends and family for always being so supportive of me

22.text: and having the opportunity to come to this great university...

25.text: I'm thankful for all the friends I've made here.

31.text: I'm thankful for the opportunity to go to such a wonderful school,

34.text: and making it through senior year.

38.text: and also of course our servicemen and women

41.text: protecting us and doing their duty every day for us

44.text: so that we can go on doing what we have to do.

47.text: I'm thankful for my parents, because

50.text: I didn't realize how awesome they were until I came to college,

53.text: and I didn't, like, have to see them every day.

56.text: OK, I am thankful for my life, my health,

58.text: my strength, I'm thankful for my family,

61.text: and I'm thankful for the U of R

66.text: the - all the bonds that I've made at this school,

71.text: my family, my friends, my health.

73.text: I'm thankful that it hasn't snowed yet.

76.text: I'm thankful for all the great opportunities at Rochester,

80.text: I had the best semester ever because

85.text: and they sent me to Denmark,

86.text: and I also love it here, it's just the best place ever,  and

90.text: that is what I'm thankful for.

96.text: but they're really amazing, and they're

98.text: helping me through a lot of trouble,

102.text: and a lot of - all the schoolwork I have to deal with,

105.text: all the stress of going to college

108.text: and they really made it possible for me to be here.

110.text: So, I'm thankful for my parents.

112.text: I'm thankful for the adorable cards that my mother sends me every week.

116.text: I'm very thankful this year for all the opportunities

119.text: the University has given me to get involved on campus

122.text: and make a difference, and all the resources the University has given me to do that.

124.text: I'm thankful for the love, health, and support I've had in my life,

129.text: thanks to the University of Rochester for supporting me in all my endeavors

136.text: thanks to my mom, dad and brother

139.text: for being there for me all the way,
